actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide criminal penalties for unauthorized disclosure of classified information.

summary.text: Prescribes penalties for the unauthorized disclosure of classified information. Enumerates defenses available to an individual charged with such offense, including: (1) prior official disclosure; (2) unlawful classification and the exhaustion of available declassification procedures; and (3) the absence of a process for reviewing the continuing necessity for the classification. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 800)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide criminal penalties for unauthorized disclosure of classified information.
